articles.title: Image of the week: Earth view for Earth Day - EUMETSAT
articles.description: EUMETSAT’s Meteosat satellites are a key part of the global ring of geostationary weather satellites and observe the Earth over Europe, Africa and the Indian Ocean. See their current view from our Earth view stream.Earth Day is an annual event held on 22 Apri…
articles.content:
Earth image
This image was captured by the imaging instrument on board the Meteosat-11 weather satellite.
The Meteosat weather satellites provide imagery for the early detection of fast-developing … [+214 chars]
